name: Shoot Out - Free Addictive Ball Shooting Game
name_original: Shoot Out - Free Addictive Ball Shooting Game
description:
This is a fun precision game where you have to shoot a ball without touching the spinning obstacles.

If you shoot the ball 5 times in a row the game gets faster and more challenging.

How to Play?

Tap the screen of the device at the right time to shoot the ball, ball will throw in the direction of the arrow, the objective is to throw ball outiside of the spinning wheel.
